name: Teravit
description:
Welcome to the world of Teravit, a sandbox game created by players!
Teravit is a sandbox game that allows players to create their own worlds and share them with other players, creating infinite play possibilites.
Obstacle courses, PvP, races, and monster hunts, Teravit has a variety of exciting game modes to play to your heart's content!

Teravit has 3 major features.

【Create】


  • Shape the world however you imagine!
    You can choose from over 250 different biomes, change island sizes, turn buildings on and off, and more, to create a fully customized world.

    Using over a hundred types of blocks, you can create all kinds of worlds of all sizes!


  • Simple build for anyone!
    By placing blocks with simple mechanics, anyone can easily create a world that is both playful and visually pleasing.


  • Play in your created world!
    "You can set different game rules in your created world.
    With a single click, you can also change the world's environment, such as the weather and background music, allowing you to freely create the game you envisioned."

【Play】


  • Enjoy fun and unique original avatars!
    Using a combination of avatar customization parts, you can create your own unique character!
    Also, by using MagicaVoxel to create original avatars, you can upload them to the in-game shop for other players to purchase your creation.


  • Packed full of action!
    In addition to a variety of weapons, including swords and bows. "Teravit" also offers unique transportation, such as a "Paraglider" which allows you to glide through the air, and a "Hookshot" to fly anywhere you want.
    Explore the world by using all kinds of weapons and items!


【Share】


  • Once you create it, share it!
    Once your world is complete, upload it and let other players around the world enjoy it. Uploaded worlds can also be played with other players in multiplayer.
    Playing other players' worlds are also available.
    Whether you enjoy building with friends, having adventures, or competing for high scores, the world of "Teravit" offers endless opportunities for fun.

  • Create to Earn!
    In worlds you have uploaded, you can sell items and avatars you have created to make the world more fun and immersive. Original avatars can also be sold in the in-game store.
    When an item is purchased by another player, points are awarded to the creator based on the amount of the purchase.
    Points can be exchanged for money or in-game currency on a dedicated website.

    ※To redeem points, you will need to access a dedicated website and link your game account. You can redeem points on this website.

Reccomended for players who want to:


  • Become a game creator!
  • Show others your creations!
  • Make money while playing games!
  • Go on an adventure in a pixel world!
  • Create buildings just for themselves!
  • Play a fun and exciting multiplayer game with friends!
  • Craft using pixelated blocks!
